InstalledItem.Name: LumaCore
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: ACOM
Size: 1
Grade: A
Class: Competition

Among small power plants, ACOM’s LumaCore consistently ranks among the best for its power rate, cool rate, and high overheat temperature. That’s why if you value your ship’s performance over anything else, this competition-grade component is perfect for you.

InstalledItem.Name: IcePlunge
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: ACOM
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Competition

When you’re pushing your ship to the limit during that frantic last lap, you’ll be glad you have ACOM’s IcePlunge to keep things cool.

InstalledItem.Name: Targa
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: YORM
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Competition

Based on Gotlieb Yorm’s original design, the Targa is a light, high performance, competition-grade generator that revolutionized racing.

InstalledItem.Name: SNS-R6
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: Nav-E7
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Competition

Increased power and performance makes the SNS-R6 stand out from other radars in its class. Get yours today to see why pilots the Empire over love components from Nav-E7 Gadgets.

InstalledItem.Name: LightFire
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Ace Astrogation
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Competition

Ace Astrogation built the LightFire for pilots who like to push the edge, but not break the bank. Its focused design provides solid performance at the expense of the component’s durability and stealth.

InstalledItem.Name: Explorer
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Jump Module
Manufacturer: Tarsus
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Journey across the ‘verse with Tarsus’ Explorer jump module, offering greater reliability to help take your wanderlust to new heights.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-111 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 1
Missiles: 1xS1

Behring’s MSD-111 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 1 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of one S1 missile.

InstalledItem.Name: Marksman I Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 1

Behring's Marksman series of proximity missiles has earned as much of a reputation for its ability to track a wide range of heat signatures as it has for its area-effect proximity damage.
